howItWorks.label: The Loop
howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three steps from supporter merch to boosted secondhand rewards.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Optional supporter gear made from recycled materials, printed on demand. Pay with EUR or B3TR tokens (15% discount).
howItWorks.step2Desc: Get a Supporter NFT that unlocks a reward multiplier inside the ReUse dApp. Level up to Silver and Gold for bigger boosts.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Earn boosted B3TR when you use ReUse for verified secondhand purchases. Use B3TR to buy more merch — the sustainable loop.

products.nftInfoDesc: Every product includes a Supporter NFT, minted automatically after checkout. This NFT acts as a reward multiplier in the ReUse dApp — the more you buy, the higher your tier (Bronze → Silver → Gold) and the bigger your reward boost when you shop secondhand.

tiers.label: Supporter NFTs
tiers.heading: Level Up Your Rewards
tiers.description: Every purchase earns you a Supporter NFT. The more items you buy, the higher your tier and reward multiplier in the ReUse dApp.

ecosystem.heading: Part of Something Bigger
ecosystem.description: ReUse is part of the VeBetterDAO ecosystem on VeChain. Every purchase helps fund ReUse adoption & secondhand growth.
ecosystem.missionNote: Your merch supports the mission — but the real impact is in the thousands of secondhand transactions powered by ReUse every day.

howItWorksPage.heading: Wear the Mission. Boost Secondhand Rewards.
howItWorksPage.subtitle: Supporter merch is optional. Every order includes a Supporter NFT that boosts your rewards when you buy secondhand with the ReUse dApp.
howItWorksPage.step1Desc: 100% recycled, made on-demand to avoid overproduction. Every purchase includes a Supporter NFT that unlocks reward boosts in the ReUse dApp.
howItWorksPage.step1Check1: Pay with EUR (credit card, iDEAL, Bancontact)
howItWorksPage.step2Desc1: After checkout, your Supporter NFT is minted to your VeChain wallet. It unlocks a reward multiplier in the ReUse dApp (Bronze → Silver → Gold).
howItWorksPage.step2Desc2: If you paid with EUR, you can claim your NFT by connecting your wallet afterwards.
howItWorksPage.step2WalletLink: Don't have a wallet? Get VeWorld in 60 seconds →
howItWorksPage.step3Desc1: Use ReUse to verify secondhand purchases and earn B3TR. Your Supporter NFT boosts those rewards by up to 2x.
howItWorksPage.step3Desc2: Use earned B3TR to get 15% off merch (optional) — or keep earning by shopping secondhand. The loop never stops.
howItWorksPage.tierDesc: Each tier unlocks a higher reward multiplier in the ReUse dApp. Tiers auto-upgrade as you buy more items.
howItWorksPage.b3trDesc: Save 15% on every order when you pay with B3TR tokens from the VeChain ecosystem.
howItWorksPage.b3trStep1: Toggle to B3TR pricing in the shop
howItWorksPage.b3trStep2: Connect your VeWorld wallet at checkout
howItWorksPage.b3trStep3: Approve the B3TR transfer in your wallet
howItWorksPage.b3trRateLock: Rate locked for 15 minutes after checkout.
howItWorksPage.ctaDesc: Support the circular economy with merch, or start earning directly by buying secondhand with the ReUse dApp.
